title: More Like CNN MINUS! | Daily Best of April 22 | Rick & Bubba
description:
CNN spends hundreds of millions of dollars launching their CNN+ streaming service only to have very low subscriber numbers forcing CNN to dismantle the whole operation after one month. Mike Tyson beats up a man after the drunk passenger won't stop bothering the boxing legend on an airplane. A bride and wedding caterer are arrested after allegedly sneaking weed into the food at the reception sending many guests to the hospital. And speaking of weed, we debate the best combo of milk and cookies.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
